entities.name: defensive magic
entities.description: Defensive magic is a type of magic that can be used for legal purposes. It was mentioned as one of the course aims in Professor Umbridge's class.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is a teacher who is teaching a class on defensive magic. She asks students to reply 'Yes, Professor Umbridge' or 'No, Professor Umbridge' when she asks them a question.

entities.name: wilbert slinkhard
entities.description: Wilbert Slinkhard is the author of the book 'Defensive Magical Theory'. Professor Umbridge asks students if they have a copy of this book.

entities.name: defensive magical theory
entities.description: Defensive Magical Theory is a book written by Wilbert Slinkhard. It was mentioned as one of the required readings for Professor Umbridge's class.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge is teaching a class on defensive magic. This relationship was established when Professor Umbridge mentioned the course aims, which included understanding the principles underlying defensive magic.
Professor Umbridge assigned the book 'Defensive Magical Theory' to her students. This relationship was established when Professor Umbridge asked if everyone had a copy of the book.

Professor Umbridge assigned the book 'Defensive Magical Theory' written by Wilbert Slinkhard to her students. This relationship was established when Professor Umbridge asked if everyone had a copy of the book.
